main.name: Moch Ridwan
main.bio: I am an experienced web developer with 6 years of work experience.
main.bio1: Talented and versatile JavaScript Engineer with 5 years of experience participating in projects through all phases of software development life cycle Agile, TDD environments, coding, testing, integration, and customization.
main.bio2: Proven ability to utilizing the latest technologies ,optimizing features and redesigning applications to improve functionality and performance. Strong collaborative, interpersonal and communication abilities to foster cross-functional cooperation and knowledge sharing in a collegial team environment to achieve consistent project excellence and user satisfaction.
main.bio3: I love working with great people, inspiring others, and being inspired.
main.bio4: I love working with great people, inspiring others, and being inspired.

testimonials.text: Moch has an incredible mind for product architecture and business development. It is difficult to find someone who can master an understanding of code, perfect financial models, and pitch an entire company all at the same time. He is also a former professional software engineer with big experience!
